Blood collection.sentence: The healthcare professional prepares the blood collection site by cleaning it with an antiseptic wipe.
Blood collection.subject: The healthcare professional

Blood collection.sentence: The healthcare professional applies a tourniquet above the intended venipuncture site to engorge the vein.
Blood collection.subject: The healthcare professional

Blood collection.sentence: The healthcare professional inserts a sterile needle into the vein to collect blood.
Blood collection.subject: The healthcare professional

Blood collection.sentence: The healthcare professional fills the blood collection tubes to the required volume.
Blood collection.subject: The healthcare professional

Blood collection.sentence: The healthcare professional removes the needle and applies pressure to the puncture site with a gauze pad.
Blood collection.subject: The healthcare professional
